rdf:Description.dc:title: Application of an assessment framework to an evolving telemental health program 2002
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Bulger, Tim.
Stayberg, Sharlene.
Urness, Douglas.
Alberta Mental Health Board.
Alberta Heritage Foundation for Medical Research.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton , Alta. : Alberta Heritage Foundation for Medical Research,
rdf:Description.dc:description: The summary of this paper includes : a) "Evaluation requirements for the Telemental Health Service (TMH) operated by the Alberta Mental Health Board changed as this program evolved from a pilot project to a mature telehealth network."."
b) "A guideline for assessment of telehealth applicastions, developed by the Alberta Heritage Foundation for Medical Research, has been used by the AMHB in its evaluation of the TMH."

c) "Constraints on assessment of the mature Telemental Health Service are the complexity of the current network, limited resources for evaluation and routine administrative requirements of decision-makers, "
Authors : David Hailey, Tim Bulger, Sharlene Stayberg, Douglas Urness.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Telecommunication in medicine
Telecommunication in medicine
Community mental health services
